oai_dc:dc.dc:title: System learning comparison of organic apple growing in four Nordic-Baltic region countries
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rahtola, M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Production systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This on-going study focuses to the farming system development of apple orchards in four countries, Finland, Estonia, Sweden and Northern Germany.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Rahtola, M. (2009) System learning comparison of organic apple growing in four Nordic-Baltic region countries. In: Programme, abstracts, list of participants, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, 5 (2), NJF Report, p. 53.
